mapper.sql: CTE_BAR_CODE, HISTORY_COUNT, CTE_NAME, CUSTOM_SERVICE_CENTER, CUSTOM_SERVICE_TOP, CUSTOM_SERVICE_LAST, CUSTOM_TYPE, LARGE_AREA, SLICE_AREA, FENBU, OPEN_DATE, OUT_DATE, BUSINESS, ACCOUNTS_TYPE, PAGE_TYPE, DAILY_DELIVERY, GOODS_DETAIL, CARRY_GOODS_TYPE, PACKET_POINT, RETURN_PIECE, MATTER, COMPLAIN_REBATE, OPTION_FINE, FEE_COMPENSATE, NOTE, STATE, CREATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from CUSTOMER
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into CUSTOMER (CTE_BAR_CODE, HISTORY_COUNT, CTE_NAME, CUSTOM_SERVICE_CENTER, CUSTOM_SERVICE_TOP, CUSTOM_SERVICE_LAST, CUSTOM_TYPE, LARGE_AREA, SLICE_AREA, FENBU, OPEN_DATE, OUT_DATE, BUSINESS, ACCOUNTS_TYPE, PAGE_TYPE, DAILY_DELIVERY, GOODS_DETAIL, CARRY_GOODS_TYPE, PACKET_POINT, RETURN_PIECE, MATTER, COMPLAIN_REBATE, OPTION_FINE, FEE_COMPENSATE, NOTE, STATE, CREATE_TIME) values (#{cteBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{historyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{cteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customServiceCenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customServiceTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customServiceLast,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{largeArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sliceArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fenbu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{openDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{outDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accountsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dailyDelivery,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{goodsDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carryGoodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{packetPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnPiece,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{matter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{complainRebate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{optionFine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{feeCompensate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

mapper.update:
update CUSTOMER
CTE_BAR_CODE = #{record.cteBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HISTORY_COUNT = #{record.historyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CTE_NAME = #{record.cteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOM_SERVICE_CENTER = #{record.customServiceCenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOM_SERVICE_TOP = #{record.customServiceTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOM_SERVICE_LAST = #{record.customServiceLast,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUSTOM_TYPE = #{record.customType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

FENBU = #{record.fenbu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where CTE_BAR_CODE = #{cteBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and HISTORY_COUNT = #{historyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update CUSTOMER set CTE_NAME = #{cteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOM_SERVICE_CENTER = #{customServiceCenter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOM_SERVICE_TOP = #{customServiceTop,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOM_SERVICE_LAST = #{customServiceLast,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUSTOM_TYPE = #{customType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LARGE_AREA = #{largeArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SLICE_AREA = #{sliceArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FENBU = #{fenbu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPEN_DATE = #{openDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, OUT_DATE = #{outDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BUSINESS = #{business,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACCOUNTS_TYPE = #{accountsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PAGE_TYPE = #{pageType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DAILY_DELIVERY = #{dailyDelivery,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, GOODS_DETAIL = #{goodsDetail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CARRY_GOODS_TYPE = #{carryGoodsType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACKET_POINT = #{packetPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RETURN_PIECE = #{returnPiece,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MATTER = #{matter,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COMPLAIN_REBATE = #{complainRebate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPTION_FINE = #{optionFine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FEE_COMPENSATE = #{feeCompensate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATE = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where CTE_BAR_CODE = #{cteBarCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and HISTORY_COUNT = #{historyCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select:
select count(*) from CUSTOMER
and CTE_BAR_CODE in (${str1})
and CTE_NAME like '%${str2}%'
and HISTORY_COUNT = 0
